requirements.title: Campaign-Based File Tracking
requirements.description: Create and manage campaigns with file glob patterns (*.go, *.js, etc.) to track files across different analysis projects
requirements.validation_method: CLI commands create campaigns and match files against patterns

requirements.title: Visit Count Tracking
requirements.description: Track and increment visit count for each file in a campaign when agents analyze or review files
requirements.validation_method: Visit counts increment correctly and persist across sessions

requirements.title: Staleness Scoring Algorithm
requirements.description: Calculate staleness score based on visit frequency, last visit time, and file modification time to prioritize files needing attention
requirements.validation_method: Staleness scores calculated correctly and prioritize modified/unvisited files

requirements.title: CLI Interface
requirements.description: Provide CLI commands for campaign management, file tracking, and query operations for programmatic agent integration
requirements.validation_method: CLI commands execute successfully and integrate with maintenance scenarios

requirements.title: JSON File Persistence
requirements.description: Store campaign data and visit tracking in JSON files for portability and transparency
requirements.validation_method: Campaign data persists correctly across service restarts

requirements.title: HTTP API
requirements.description: Provide HTTP API endpoints for web interface and external integrations with CRUD operations for campaigns
requirements.validation_method: API endpoints return correct data and support campaign management

requirements.title: Web Interface
requirements.description: Build React-based web interface for manual campaign management and visualization of staleness metrics
requirements.validation_method: UI displays campaigns, files, and staleness data with functional CRUD operations

requirements.title: File Synchronization
requirements.description: Sync campaign files with filesystem using glob pattern matching to discover new files and remove deleted ones
requirements.validation_method: File sync discovers new files and removes deleted files correctly

requirements.title: File Prioritization
requirements.description: Provide sorted lists of least visited and most stale files to guide agent analysis workflows
requirements.validation_method: Prioritization queries return correctly sorted files by staleness and visit count

requirements.title: Campaign Export/Import
requirements.description: Export and import campaign data for backup, sharing, and migration between environments
requirements.validation_method: Exported campaigns import correctly with all tracking data preserved

requirements.title: Advanced Analytics
requirements.description: Provide trend analysis and advanced staleness metrics to identify patterns in code review workflows

requirements.title: Git History Integration
requirements.description: Enhance staleness detection by incorporating git commit history and change frequency

requirements.title: Multi-Project Management
requirements.description: Manage campaigns across multiple projects and repositories for large-scale code analysis

requirements.title: Automated File Discovery
requirements.description: Automatically suggest file patterns and discover relevant files based on project structure and analysis goals
